entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
